text: is a Japanese politician. He was the Minister for Internal Affairs and Communications for a short time in 2022. He is a member of the Liberal Democratic Party. He is also in the House of Representatives since 2012 and was Special Advisor to Prime Minister Fumio Kishida from December 2021 to August 2022. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Hiroshima Category:Internal Affairs and Communications ministers of Japan
title: Minoru Terada
